name: Super Games Pack 2
overview: Super Games Pack 2 is a compilation of 4 games for the VIC-20. - Blokit: a 1-player game versus computer where players take turns placing pieces on a board. First to get 5-in-a-row is the winner. - Cannonade: an artillery duel game where players try to shoot through a hole in a wall by inputting the power and direction of fire. - Road Rally: a top-down 2D scrolling driving game. The player chooses the width of track. - Skittles: a bowling game where the player has to choose the correct time to release a moving ball on the left to hit pins at the right of the screen.
